name: Build a Small Wooden Shelter
goal: Construct a compact 5x5x3 safe house with foundation, walls, roof, and door

steps.title: Check Inventory
steps.details: Check your inventory to see if you have 32 oak_logs or 128 oak_planks. You can skip gathering them if this is true.

steps.title: Gather Materials (if needed)
steps.details: Collect 32 oak_logs or 128 oak_planks (if you do not have one of them already).

steps.title: Craft Supplies
steps.details: Craft them all your oak_logs into oak_planks. Then craft 1 crafting_table and use it to craft 1 oak_door.

steps.title: Construct Shelter
steps.details: Build the complete shelter structure in one go. The bot will automatically handle the floor, walls, roof, and door placement. params: { "structure": "shelter", "width": 5, "length": 5, "height": 3, "material": "oak_planks" }

important_notes: The 'shelter' structure automatically clears the area, builds the foundation, walls, roof, and installs the door.
Ensure you have the oak_door in your inventory before starting the build step.
